title: StartIvoryDay2
body:
Customer: Hey, long time no see.
Customer: Just kidding.
Customer: How about gin and tonic this time?

title: GetGlassDrink1AIvoryDay2
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 0>>
<<set $alcoholicaf to true>>

Customer: Thanks again.
Customer: Just trying something new, y'know?
Customer: Whiskey's all I've known. 

[[Since when?|1AIvoryDay2]]
[[That's a little limited.|1BIvoryDay2]]

title: GetNotDrink1IvoryDay2
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 2>>

Customer: Okay, I know you're new, but that's kind of fucked up, man.
Customer: Especially after yesterday.
Customer: Guess I'll leave now...
Customer: Fuck me for ending up here every time.
Customer: Bye.

<<customerleave Dialogue>>

title: 1AIvoryDay2
body:
Customer: Since... high school?
Customer: I don't know, it's all my dad drank.

<<if $alcoholicaf is true>>
Customer: Snuck some from his stash, haha.
Customer: He'd get real mad.
Customer: Not that he needed any more reasons to get mad, but...
Customer: I was born to piss him off, I guess.
Customer: Haha, if he saw me drinking this right now--
Customer: Not sure what he'd do first, beat me up or.
Customer: What was it?
Customer: Threaten to disown me for the hundredth time?
<<else>>
Customer: The good old days!
Customer: Not that I'd go back to it, but.
Customer: Some things were simpler back then.
<<endif>>
Customer: Anyway.

[[You alright?|2AIvoryDay2]]
[[Nice childhood.|2BIvoryDay2]]

title: 1BIvoryDay2
body:
Customer: Yeah, I know.
Customer: That's what everyone told me in college.
Customer: Not everyone grew up on their dad's drinking habits, I guess.

<<if $alcoholicaf is true>>
Customer: He'd get some every day, just 'cause he'd go through so much of it.
Customer: It was pretty easy to sneak some.
Customer: Then he'd get real mad.
Customer: Not that he needed any more reasons to get mad, but...
Customer: I was born to piss him off, I guess.
Customer: Haha, if he saw me drinking this right now--
Customer: Not sure what he'd do first, beat me up or.
Customer: What was it?
Customer: Threaten to disown me for the hundredth time?
<<else>>
Customer: The good old days!
Customer: Not that I'd go back to it, but.
Customer: Some things were simpler back then.
<<endif>>
Customer: Anyway.

[[You alright?|2AIvoryDay2]]
[[Nice childhood.|2BIvoryDay2]]

title: GetGlassDrink1BIvoryDay2
body:
<<set $rightdrink to 0>>
<<set $alcoholicaf to false>>

Customer: Thanks again.
Customer: Just trying something new, y'know?
Customer: Whiskey's all I've known. 

[[Since when?|1AIvoryDay2]]
[[That's a little limited.|1BIvoryDay2]]

title: 2AIvoryDay2
body:
<<if $alcoholicaf is true>>
Customer: Uhmm.
Customer: Yeah, sorry, I think I'm fucking drunk.
Customer: Guess I got what I ask for.
<<else>>
Customer: Yeeep.
Customer: Thanks.
<<endif>>

Customer: ...Time to head back.
<<if $alcoholicaf is true>>
Customer: Before I spout more bullshit.
<<else>>
Customer: Get me more drunk next time.
<<endif>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>

title: 2BIvoryDay2
body:
<<if $alcoholicaf is true>>
Customer: Nah dude, it's a great one!
Customer: I'm not too fucked up now, right?
Customer: ...
Customer: Yeah, sorry, I think I'm fucking drunk.
Customer: Guess I got what I ask for.
<<else>>
Customer: Hahaha.
Customer: You can say that again.
Customer: I'd say I didn't have the best one, but.
Customer: I'm fine now, right?
<<endif>>

Customer: ...Time to head back.
<<if $alcoholicaf is true>>
Customer: Before I spout more bullshit.
<<else>>
Customer: Get me more drunk next time.
<<endif>>
<<customerleave Dialogue>>
